name: Dragon Ball: Dragon Daihikyou
description: Dragon Ball: Dragon Daihikyou is the first Dragon Ball console video game ever released. It was developed and released by Epoch in September 27, 1986, for the * Super Cassette Vision console*. The game is an overhead shoot'em up that allows players to take on the role of Goku, passing through stages while riding on the Flying Nimbus in order to collect the Dragon Balls. A Dragon Ball is hidden at the end of each stage, collecting it allows the player clear to the stage.
